elements.name: As a user when I click on the Upload technical management qualifications page, then the Technical qualifications selection page should be displayed

steps.name: the application has been launched
I am on the "Apply for a mobile plant standard rules waste permit" page
I click on "Continue" button
I am on the "Select a permit" page
I select a permit "SR2010-No-4"
I click on "Continue" button
I am on the Task list page
I click on the "Upload technical management qualifications" link
I am on the "What evidence of technical competence do you have?" page

cells: options
WAMITAB or EPOC qualification

Deemed competence or an Environment Agency assessment with WAMITAB continuing competence certification
Energy & Utility Skills / ESA Competence Management System

elements.name: As a user when I click on the options on the Upload technical management qualifications page, then the respective upload documents page should be displayed

steps.name: following are the options on the the technical qualifications page:
I click on "WAMITAB or EPOC qualification" on the Upload technical management qualifications page
I click on "Continue" button
I am on the "WAMITAB or EPOC: upload evidence" page
I click back
I am on the "What evidence of technical competence do you have?" page
I click on "Weâ€™re getting WAMITAB or EPOC qualifications" on the Upload technical management qualifications page
I click on "Continue" button
I am on the "Getting a qualification: upload evidence" page
I click back
I am on the "What evidence of technical competence do you have?" page
I click on "Deemed competence or an Environment Agency assessment with WAMITAB continuing competence certification" on the Upload technical management qualifications page
I click on "Continue" button
I am on the "Deemed competence or an assessment: upload evidence" page
I click back
I am on the "What evidence of technical competence do you have?" page
I click on "Energy & Utility Skills / ESA Competence Management System" on the Upload technical management qualifications page
I click on "Continue" button
I am on the "Energy & Utility Skills / ESA: upload evidence" page
I click back
I am on the "What evidence of technical competence do you have?" page

elements.name: As a user, I should be able to upload JPG technical documents for the technical competencies
